subject: College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: Syracuse will play home games against Southern California in 2012 and Notre Dame in 2014 and 2016 at the new $1.6 billion stadium in the Meadowlands.
snippet: Syracuse will play home games against Southern California in 2012 and Notre Dame in 2014 and 2016 at the new $1.6 billion stadium in the Meadowlands.
